Pre-Game Insights: The Kings face the Warriors, looking for their 4th straight victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Warriors are 1-5 in division play
The Kings are 2-6 against the rest of their division
The Warriors are shooting 45.0% from the field this season
The Kings are shooting 47.6% from the field
Others: Stephen Curry is averaging 22.3 points and 6.5 assists for the Warriors
